basic.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris NCCB 92058(MIC=16µg/ml),Xanthomonas translucens pv. graminis LMG 587(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=8µg/ml),Ralstonia syzygii subsp. syzygii LMG 6969(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ET8(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii LMG 01041(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus subsp. aureus 5334R4(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=8µg/ml),Micrococcus flavus(MIC=2µg/ml)
